snippet.title: Funko Fusion - Bob Ross Pack Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
There are no mistakes, just happy accidents. Bring the joy of painting to Funko Fusion with the iconic artist and cultural icon Bob Ross!

Available now, the Bob Ross Pack introduces everyone’s favorite artist to Funko Fusion and contains:
- Bob Ross as a playable character.
- Bob Ross alternate Overalls Outfit
- Additional Variants for the default and Overalls Outfits

Play as Bob Ross and bring his artistry to Funko Fusion’s in-game worlds!
